summary: Introduced by Representative Arrington, H.R. 255 is a bill that seeks to name a federal facility. It proposes that the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) community-based outpatient clinic in Lubbock, Texas, be officially named the 'General Bernie Mittemeyer VA Clinic.' If passed into law, the bill mandates that all official references to the clinic in government laws, maps, documents, and records be updated to use the new designation. The bill was referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs for review.
